title: My Husband Likes Pictures of Big Butts
itunes:title: My Husband Likes Pictures of Big Butts
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, my husband and I have been married for 15 years and we have 2 children. I was helping my daughter with a home school video 3 weeks ago and my husband’s phone is top of the line so I was using it. I saved the video and when I went in to edit it, I saw a lot of pictures of breasts, booties and feet in my husband’s phone. It seems that I’m married to a real creep that randomly takes pictures of women when they are not looking......................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
